metadata.name: Rush Hour
metadata.description:
Istanbul, you are a beautiful woman with blue eyes, you carry millions in your arms. In our rush, we always forget to acknowledge you.

The idea of taking the photo came as a collabration to my own work (Poseidon, The Others & The Night Walk). 
It was created by combining 4 photographs taken by hand at 1/4 shutter speed. As in my other works, there are no digital effects in this photograph. 
Exif is available.

Photographer: Melih Taner Tanyeli  
Edition: Limited  
Location: Istanbul - Turkey  
Jpeg Size: 5454x3744/300dpi

Licence: Extended Editorial  
Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants.
